<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Warding Escutcheon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1863)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 23 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 4
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Tower Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=4)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

An image of a keyhole adorns the coat of arms of this stone [tower shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=4) (Hardness 10, HP 40, BT 20).

<document level="2" id="action-1561" />

<document level="2" id="action-1562" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 9"
pfs="Standard"
>
Warding Escutcheon
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 23 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 625 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 4

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 20"
pfs="Standard"
>
Warding Escutcheon (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 23 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 55,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 4

</row>

</column>

---

The shield has Hardness 20, HP 80, and BT 40. The DCs are 43, and using the second activation casts [_resplendent mansion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=257), forming a tall stone keep.
name: Warding Escutcheon (Greater)
